error.body:
The currently installed version can't be determined.

To resolve the issue add a supported lockfile (package-lock.json or yarn.lock).
error.title: Dependabot can't update vulnerable dependencies without a lockfile

cwes.description: The product receives input or data, but it does not validate or incorrectly validates that the input has the properties that are required to process the data safely and correctly.
cwes.name: Improper Input Validation

repository.description: OWASP Juice Shop: Probably the most modern and sophisticated insecure web application
repository.name: sample_repo

vulnerability.description:
Versions 4.2.1 and earlier of `jsonwebtoken` are affected by a verification bypass vulnerability. This is a result of weak validation of the JWT algorithm type, occuring when an attacker is allowed to arbitrarily specify the JWT algorithm.




## Recommendation

Update to version 4.2.2 or later.
